definition: a strip of metal with ends bent at right angles, to suffer from sudden painful contraction of a muscle
details:
noun
- a strip of metal with ends bent at right angles
= synonyms: cramp iron
- a clamp for holding pieces of wood together while they are glued
- a painful and involuntary muscular contraction
= synonyms: spasm
verb
- to suffer from sudden painful contraction of a muscle
- to affect with or as if with a cramp
- to prevent the progress or free movement of
= synonyms: halter
- to secure with a cramp
= example: to secure with a cramp
